name: Venom-Xmd
description: A whatsApp bot based on Baileysjs linrary (Ts+Js) with Multi Device support

BOT_PREFIX.description: Put your bot prefix of desire here

ANTIDELETE.description: type true if you want your bot to detect deleted messages in your dm if else type false

AUTO_TYPE.description: type true if you want your bot to show fake typing in your chats  if else type false

AUTO_RECORD.description: type true if you want your bot to show fake recording in your chat if else type false

AUTO_STATUS.description: type true if you want bot to view status if else type false

PACK_NAME.description: type your sticker pack name here

AUTHOR.description: type your author sticker name here
